title: Spring and All by William Carlos Williams

content.question: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim about how Williams uses poetic elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex perspective on the approach of spring.

frqParts.text: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim about how Williams uses poetic elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex perspective on the approach of spring.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
